org.apache.flink.runtime.iterative.task

Interface Terminable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIterativePactTask, IterationHeadPactTask, IterationIntermediatePactTask, IterationSynchronizationSinkTask, IterationTailPactTask

    public interface Terminable
    Models the functionality that the termination of an iterative task can be requested from outside
